data.description: With this setting enabled, infill will be printed before the walls. This results in better overhangs because the walls will stick to the already printed infill.
data.img_description: The left animation shows infill before walls, the right one walls before infill.
data.hints: - Printing in this order can also have a disadvantage: If the infill is printed before the walls, there is a chance that the infill will be visible through the walls, resulting in a rougher surface finish.
